QuestData.Title: The Hermit of Swamplight Manor
QuestData.Description: There's a fellow the locals know as "Swamp Eye" Jarl, who lives alone out in the swamp. Sometime ago he "took over" Swamplight Manor after the previous owners disappeared under mysterious circumstances.$B$BI like to send someone to check up on him every once in a while. He kind of reminds me of my grandfather, you know? Some say he's not quite right in the head.$B$BIf you're headed northwest on the road out of Theramore, you'll find Swamplight Manor in the Witch Hill area, before the road turns west.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to "Swamp Eye" Jarl at Swamplight Manor.
QuestData.RewardText: Get off my lawn... unless, that is, you want to help old "Swamp Eye" with a little bit of cooking. Whad'ya say?
